about.title: About WASPALGO
about.subtitle: WASPALGO is a trading algorithm technology provider, not a regulated asset manager.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: WASPALGO develops and provides trading algorithm technologies. Our WA-AMIR engine (WASP Autonomous Market Intelligence Reactor) is designed to analyze markets and generate automated trading signals.
whoWeAre.p2: We are a technology provider, not an investment advisor or fund manager. Our role is to provide the algorithmic tool, not to manage your capital.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: We believe that algorithmic automation allows investors to benefit from markets without having to trade themselves. You deposit your capital, we connect the algorithm, and it trades automatically on your behalf, 24/7, without emotions, following strict and tested rules. This also allows people without trading knowledge to invest and generate passive income.
vision.p2: Our goal is to democratize automated investing by making advanced algorithmic trading technology accessible to everyone. The algorithm makes trading decisions for you, but you maintain full control of your account: you can stop, modify, or withdraw your capital at any time.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.internal: Internal Development: WA-AMIR is developed and optimized internally by our technical team.
methodology.backtesting: Rigorous Backtesting: All our algorithms are tested on extensive historical data and subjected to stress scenarios.
methodology.transparency: Transparency: We display the real and historical performance of our algorithms, without promises or guarantees.
methodology.control: User Control: You maintain full control of your capital. The algorithm sends signals, but it's your account that executes positions.

step1.description: Fill out the access form with your basic information and availability. No credit card, no commitment.

step2.title: WhatsApp Contact
step2.description: We contact you via WhatsApp to discuss your profile, answer your questions, and plan the next steps of the process.

step3.title: Creating an account on a partner platform
step3.description: If you don't have an account yet, we guide you through creating an account on a compatible partner platform.

step4.title: Algorithm Connection
step4.description: We give you access to a strategy that is connected to our WA-AMIR algorithm.

step5.title: Follow-up
step5.description: After setup, regular follow-up is provided to answer your questions and optimize the configuration if necessary.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find all the answers to the most common questions about WASPALGO.

cta.title: Have other questions?
cta.subtitle: Feel free to contact us via the access form for any additional questions.

q1.question: Do you manage my money?
q1.answer: No. WASPALGO never touches your money. Your capital remains 100% in your own account. The algorithm only sends automated signals, and it's your account that executes positions. You maintain total control, at all times.

q2.question: Can I withdraw my capital at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, of course. You are free to withdraw or deposit whenever you want, without fees and without delay. WA-AMIR does not block any funds: everything is managed directly from the broker.

q3.question: What are the risks?
q3.answer: As with any investment in financial markets, there is always a risk of loss. However, WA-AMIR is designed to: continuously analyze the market, detect trends and reversals, limit excessive exposure, secure positions according to market conditions. The algorithm also receives macroeconomic alerts in case of announcements likely to impact the market (FOMC, NFP, CPI…), which allows it to adapt its strategy.

q4.question: How does the WA-AMIR engine make decisions?
q4.answer: WA-AMIR uses a combination of technical analysis, statistical models, and real-time data. It automatically identifies: favorable zones, reversals, entry and exit signals, volatility periods. Its goal: execute logical, consistent, and emotion-free decisions.

q5.question: What platforms are compatible?
q5.answer: WA-AMIR currently works via Pu Prime, which serves as a secure intermediary. Then, it is possible to connect MetaTrader 4 or 5 to Pu Prime, which allows: tracking all positions in real-time, consulting the complete history, checking activity directly from MetaTrader.

q6.question: How much does access to the algorithm cost?
q6.answer: Access to WA-AMIR is 100% free. No subscription, no initial payment. WASPALGO only takes 10% of the profits you make each month. If you don't make any profits during the month, you don't pay anything.

q7.question: Can I stop WA-AMIR whenever I want?
q7.answer: Yes. You can disable the algorithm with one click. All positions remain visible and controllable from MetaTrader or Pu Prime.

q8.question: What capital is recommended to start?
q8.answer: Technically, you can start with the minimum capital required by your broker. However, for an optimal experience, we recommend a minimum capital of $600.

q9.question: Does the algorithm work 24/7?
q9.answer: WA-AMIR works continuously during market opening (5 days out of 7). It continuously analyzes XAUUSD to seize the best opportunities as soon as they appear.

q10.question: What returns can I expect?
q10.answer: Returns vary according to: market conditions, volatility, economic periods. We display a real and transparent history, but no performance is guaranteed.

q11.question: Can the algorithm lose money?
q11.answer: Yes. All strategies involve risks. WA-AMIR can experience losses, but it is designed to: limit drawdowns, optimize risk management, aim for stable performance over the long term.

legal.title: Legal Notice & Risks
legal.subtitle: Essential information about risks, the nature of our services, and your rights as a user.

riskWarnings.title: Risk Warnings
riskWarnings.subtitle: It is essential to understand the risks before using WA-AMIR.

capitalLoss.title: Capital loss risk
capitalLoss.description: Trading on financial markets involves a high risk of capital loss. You may lose part or all of your initial investment. Only invest funds you can afford to lose.

noPerformanceGuarantee.title: No performance guarantee
noPerformanceGuarantee.description: Past performance, simulations, or backtests do not guarantee future results in any way. Market conditions can change, and historical results are not necessarily indicative of future performance.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: No investment advice
noInvestmentAdvice.description: No information on this site constitutes investment advice, a recommendation to buy or sell, or a solicitation of an offer to buy or sell any financial instrument. Trading decisions are your sole responsibility.

marketVolatility.title: Market volatility
marketVolatility.description: Financial markets are volatile and can move quickly. Losses can occur even with a well-designed strategy. Make sure you understand trading mechanisms before starting.

nature.title: Nature of service
nature.p1: WASPALGO is a trading algorithm technology brand. WASPALGO is not a regulated fund manager, nor a regulated investment advisor.
nature.p2: WA-AMIR (WASP Autonomous Market Intelligence Reactor) is an algorithmic engine that analyzes markets and generates trading signals. The user retains full control of their trading account and capital.
nature.p3: The algorithm can be connected to the user's trading account with a partner broker, but the user maintains ownership and control of their funds at all times.

responsibilities.title: User responsibilities
items: The user is solely responsible for their trading decisions and capital management.
The user must understand the risks associated with trading before using the algorithm.
The user can stop using the algorithm at any time.
The user must ensure compliance with applicable regulations in their country of residence.

data.title: Data & backtests
data.p1: Backtests and simulations mentioned on this site are based on historical data and theoretical scenarios. They do not guarantee future results and may not reflect actual market conditions.
data.p2: Stress test scenarios are theoretical simulations used for internal risk analysis purposes. They do not necessarily represent events that will occur in the future.

cta.title: Questions?

waAmirSt.intro: WA-AMIR (WASP Autonomous Market Intelligence Reactor) is the algorithmic engine developed by WASPALGO. ST V1 is the short-term version of this engine, designed to exploit short-term market movements. The algorithm has been operating since April 2025 in private phase and is now open to the public since November 1, 2025.

architecture.title: General architecture
architecture.p1: WA-AMIR ST V1 continuously analyzes financial markets according to a defined algorithmic logic. The engine identifies specific price, volatility, and market structure configurations that match its decision rules.
architecture.p2: When a corresponding configuration is detected, the algorithm triggers a position according to strict and tested rules. The process is fully automated and operates without emotions, allowing constant discipline in execution.

horizon.title: Trading horizon & style
horizon.p1: WA-AMIR ST V1 is designed for horizons of a few hours to a few days. This version generates more signals than the long-term version, as it reacts to short-term market movements.
horizon.p2: The goal is to exploit short-term movements while maintaining disciplined risk management. Each position is evaluated according to predefined risk criteria.

assets.title: Assets concerned
assets.p1: WA-AMIR ST V1 concentrates 100% of its activity on gold (XAUUSD). This exclusive exposure reflects the current algorithm configuration and its optimization for this market.
assets.p2: The algorithm is entirely dedicated to trading on XAUUSD, which allows for maximum optimization for this specific market.

backtests.title: Backtests & stress scenarios
backtests.p1: WA-AMIR ST V1 has been backtested on the last 4 years of market data. Results show good robustness across different market phases, with very strong periods on gold.
backtests.p2: Stress tests include various unfavorable market scenarios, including periods of high volatility and price shocks on XAUUSD. The algorithm has demonstrated its ability to manage these situations while maintaining rigorous risk management.

role.title: Your role & that of the algorithm
role.p1: You simply deposit your capital into your account with a partner broker, then we connect WA-AMIR to your account. The algorithm trades automatically on your behalf, 24/7, without you having to intervene.
role.p2: You can let your investment run for weeks, months, or years without doing anything. You remain the owner of your account and can withdraw your profits or initial capital at any time. You can stop the algorithm instantly if you wish.
role.p3: Before any setup, a private exchange allows explaining the operation and answering your questions.
